first.content: My darling! It is good to see you.| I have much to tell.

first_overflow.content: It seems our latest trial was again [b][url=Berries]fruitless[/url][/b].| I felt the urge when dealing with a patient just yesterday.

any_difference.content: None at all, I'm afraid. This time it happened at night, which was convenient for me.

what_happened.content: Same as ever. I see blood, I am sent into a rage!

what_happened_overflow.content: I barely contained myself this time, it was only luck that I found a stray dog and was able to feed on it.

give_up.content: I think it is well past time for us to give up our quest. There is but one cure for vampirism,| the blade.

options: There is more we can try.

dramatic.content: Not at all, my dear. How long have we tried to remedy this curse? The next time I go mad, how do you know it will subside with [b][url=Dandy]sunlight[/url][/b]?

dramatic_overflow.content: No. I have lived a good life, and a good afterlife too.| This charade cannot continue.

try_more.content: There is much more you can try, my dear. Your potions [b][url=Dandy]shine[/url][/b] more brightly than any medical knowledge.

options: There's more to life than power
I can't mend a broken leg with a potion

my_friend.content: You know how I care for you my dearest, but that does not change the reality of the situation.

my_friend_overflow.content: I am dangerous, and I grow more dangerous with time.

saved_many.content: Do you know this? I lose many good people as well, and they become my meals.

saved_many_overflow.content: How do you know I act in good faith? Even I do not know what my true intentions are.

wielding_power.content: The gods blessed me only with beauty, but you they blessed with beauty and intelligence.

wielding_power_overflow.content: Perhaps I am too simple minded to see why your efforts must be wasted here, why you serve the beck and call of those who disagree with you.

broken_leg.content: No darling, you cannot. But there is much more you can do with your potions

options: The town would be without a doctor.
Your behavior speaks louder than words.
What would you have me do?

be_alone.content: I know this, and it hurts me. But you have chosen this lot in life, for what reason I cannot speculate.

town_doctor.content: The town would also be without a killer!

results_proof.content: Your results are more proof than mine!

behavior_speaks.content: And so do yours. You cherish my life even though you could spend your efforts elsewhere.

behavior_speaks_overflow.content: You listen to the baron even though he could not raise a hand to you. Why do this? Why conscribe yourself to a life of servitude?

what_do.content: You ask this, but you know my answer, my darling. Throw down your chains, free yourself from this rote drugery.

what_do_overflow.content: I want nothing more than to never see you again, my love. If you stay with me, we will all fall to the minutae of local happenings.

options: I'm not having this argument again.

subject_change.content: I did no such thing. The subject is what we are doing and your answer is nothing.

help_need.content: You help the baron in his vainglorious conquests, the store owners in their competition, and the seamstresses who want to sleep less.

eye_spark.content: I have seen the spark in your eye when you come up with a clever remedy, why do you debase yourself to such trifles?

eye_spark_overflow.content: Why do you toil under the baron? Why have a broomstick if not to fly?

options: I can help you too, with time.

no_wouldnt.content: You limit yourself to this binary, why? I have seen how much good can be done by you.

no_wouldnt_overflow.content: You spend your time debating yourself, and always deciding to keep the status quo.

options: What would you have me do?
I can help you too, with time.

time_help.content: You do not know that, |you cannot know that.

final.content: I do not wish to argue with you, you always win. I will come back tomorrow and we will continue, just as we are now, Didi.
